thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Veronica
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Veronica

author: Veronica
title: Veronica
text: I was a little scared to choose a travel agent online getting it all set up through email but the lady I got Dyonne Burgers was very efficient and reliable and always got back to my questions or changes. Everything she set up from the hotels to transportation ran so smoothly. I would definitely use them again in the future
